*The Remote Company (MailerLite) is hiring a Content Writer* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

100% remote.
100% trust to manage your own schedule. 
0 weekly Zoom calls. 
3+ years of writing/editing long-form articles and website copy. 
5 SaaS products focusing on email marketing, web design, no-code, and app development.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://www.remotecompany.com/jobs/content-writer>
